text:
@GOPLeader Your master consistently praised China as the coronavirus hit the USA 🙄

He then did nothing for 80 days except downplay the virus by saying it would go from 15 to 0.

Don’t forget about Ivanka’s numerous Chinese trademarks.

https://t.co/vLaYG6g7pq
